revised_title: Decomposition and Analysis of Ammonia and Cyanogen Compounds
tldr: The author, Robert Smith, discusses the decomposition and analysis of ammonia and cyanogen compounds using chlorine compounds. He describes a method for estimating the quantity of ammonia in a solution and the decomposition of hydrocyanic acid and its compounds. Additionally, he explores the use of hypochlorites and chloride of lime for the decomposition of uric acid and as a method for estimating nitrogen in urine.
